title: Homemade Corn Dogs
method: Step 2: Combine cornmeal, flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl; stir in milk and egg to make a batter.
Step 3: Heat oil in a deep fryer or large saucepan to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Step 4: Meanwhile, pat frankfurters dry and insert a skewer into each one.
Step 5: Roll frankfurters in batter until well coated.
Step 6: Fry 2 or 3 corn dogs at a time in preheated oil until lightly browned, about 3 minutes.

Step 9: We have determined the nutritional value of oil for frying based on a retention value of 10% after cooking. The exact amount may vary depending on cook time and temperature, ingredient density, and the specific type of oil used.
